Description: A 9-character alpha-numeric code assigned to each committee by the FEC. Committee IDs are unique.
The officially registered treasurer for the committee.
A=Authorized by candidate B=Lobbyist/Registrant PAC D=Leadership PAC J=Joint fundraiser P=Principal campaign committee U=Unauthorized
A=Administratively terminated D=Debt M=Monthly Q=Quarterly T=Terminated W=Waived
C=Corporation L=Labor M=Membership T=Trade association V=Cooperative W=Corp without capital stock H=Host I=Inaugural
When committee type is H S or P the candidate ID is in this field.
